KitKat:

She looked at Blackfang. Predacons weren't supposed to be programmed 
to feel regret. However, she was feeling it.  Regret, regret that she 
wouldn't have more time to be with Blackfang. Why in her spark she 
wanted to be with him was beyond her, but she knew it to be true that 
she had feelings for them.  She looked at him and commited his face 
to her memeory banks. If she was to leave this world for good, she 
wanted his face to be that last thing her optics showed her mind. 

"Well, if it's the pit he want's, then let's give him the pit."

She smiled at him, "Oh, and if we live through this, maybe perhaps we 
could go on that picnic you spoke of a long time ago."  She said with 
a grin.  







--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Unicron's message arrived, and Blackfang looked dead serious when 
> his eyes met KitKat's.
> 
> Blackfang: There, you have it. Unicron's here and the three 
factions 
> sorta agreed to work together for the time being. From what it 
looks 
> like, we're going to have some more company. Minions. They're 
strong 
> as Gestalts, but they're our size. Got any weapons?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
> <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > KitKat::
> > 
> > She turned and looked at Blackfang. "Unicron? So what's one bot 
> got 
> > to do with anything? Geesh, you sleep for what seems to an eon 
and 
> > you miss everything. OK, brief me on the latest scorecard on 
who's 
> > who and what's what."  She tilted her head to the side only a 
> > fraction and thought. She looked at Blackfang. "Uhm, please."
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > Blackfang finished honing his halberd, then got up and went 
back 
> to 
> > > check on KitKat.
> > > 
> > > Blackfang: Sorry to interrupt you guys, but maybe you should 
get 
> > > ready. Unicron's gonna be here anytime now...
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
> > > <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > > > KitKat::
> > > > 
> > > > She looked up at Cooley and awaited an answer.
> > > > She had to refocus her optics as she had found her mind 
> wandering 
> > > > again to Blackfang. Now was not the time to dwell on lost, 
> lost 
> > > > crushes or cravings. Now she was setting herself to be in 
> command 
> > > of 
> > > > a group again. She hoped that with hard work, she would again 
> > rule 
> > > > over a group of predacons and bring them to victory over the 
> > > > maximals. Which was her spark's fondest wish  for her 
> everntual 
> > > > future. She refocused her optics and looked at Cooley.
